import React from "react"; export default function Home(){ let description=[ {id: 1,text: "We know that in the world of development not everyone who claims to be a programmer can measure up. We don't mean that they mislead customers by promising results, but maybe they don't have the right mindset."}, {id: 2,text: "For us, the challenge is not to stop learning, doing a lot of research, working hard, making time to test new technologies, learning new programming languages ​​and languages, while dedicating exclusive attention to our clients."}, {id: 3,text: "Contact us now, we want to take your business to the next level and keep you above your competitors."}] return( <> {/* Hero */}

Are you ready to change the level of your business forever?

We're here to turn your genius into software. You don't need to look any further, we are the team you need.

{/* Description */}
{description?.map(d=>

{d.text}

)}
) }
